page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: {REDDITCH}IS FORTUNATE IN THE WIDE RANGE OF DIFFERENT RECREATIONS AVAILABLE.MOST FAMILIES HAVE,RADIOS,TELEVISIONS,AND RECORD PLAYERS.LOCAL CLUBS INCLUDE{ {CUBS,BROWNIES,SCOUTS,GUIDES.}SWIMMING IS A POPULAR SPORT, PEOPLE GO TO THE LOCAL, HEWELL ROAD,{SWIMMING POOL.}THE {LIBRARY}IN THE TOWN CENTRE IS A USEFUL ASSET TO THE TOWN.ATHLETICS IS CATERED FOR BY THE {ABBEY STADIUM}THIS IS JUST OUTSIDE OUR REGION.WE HAVE{REDDITCH {UNITED FOOTBALL CLUB}IN THE DISTRICT,AND ALSO SEVERAL PRIVATE CLUBS.MANY OF OUR PARENTS BELONG TO THE {BATCHLEY SOCIAL CLUB}.FOR THOSE INTERESTED IN DANCING AND LIVE MUSIC MANY OF THE LOCAL PUBLIC HOUSES HAVE DANCES,MUSIC AND OTHER ATTRACTIONS.
